    • Field Detail

      • map

        private final java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,CalendarModel> map

      • calFile

        public final java.io.File calFile
        Represents the file on disk where the calendar(s) are saved and/or loaded

    • Constructor Detail

      • CalendarController

        public CalendarController(java.io.File calFile)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Initializes the CalendarController to have one default CalendarModel in the map that keeps track of the CalendarModel objects. Loads previous CalendarModel's and their respective events from the calendarFile if applicable.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

    • Method Detail

      • loadCalendars

        private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,CalendarModel> loadCalendars()
                                                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Load the calendar state from the file specified by calFile.
        Returns:
        the mapping of calendar names to CalendarModel objects which was loaded from the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there was an error reading the file, or if the file data is somehow corrupt

      • getCalendarNames

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getCalendarNames()
        get a set containing the names of all the calendars.
        Returns:
        a set containing the names of all the calendars

      • createNewCalendar

        public void createNewCalendar(java.lang.String name)
                       throws CalendarAlreadyExistsException
        creates and adds a new calendar with the given name
        Parameters:
        name - -- the name of the calendar
        Throws:
        CalendarAlreadyExistsException - if a calendar with the given name already exists

      • deleteCalendar

        public boolean deleteCalendar(java.lang.String name)
        Removes a CalendarModel from the dictionary that holds the different calendars and their names
        Parameters:
        name - -- the name of the CalendarModel to be removed

      • renameCalendar

        public void renameCalendar(java.lang.String newName,
                           java.lang.String oldName)
                    throws CalendarAlreadyExistsException,
                           NoSuchCalendarException
        Renames a CalendarModel in the map that keeps track of all of the different calendars
        Parameters:
        newName - -- the new name of the calendar
        oldName - -- the old name of the calendar
        Throws:
        CalendarAlreadyExistsException - if a calendar with the given new name already exists
        NoSuchCalendarException - if no calendar with the given old name exists

      • addEvent

        public void addEvent(java.lang.String calName,
                     CalendarEvent newEvent)
              throws NoSuchCalendarException
        Takes a CalendarModel and adds a new event to it
        Parameters:
        calName - -- name of the calendar
        newEvent - -- the CalendarEvent to add to the CalendarModel
        Throws:
        NoSuchCalendarException - if there is no calendar with the given name

        Parameters:
        calName - -- name of the calendar
        newEvent - -- the CalendarEvent to add to the CalendarModel
        Throws:

        Parameters:

        year - -- the year to get events from
        Returns:

                                        java.time.LocalDateTime after)
                                 throws NoSuchCalendarException

        Parameters:

        before - -- the LocalDateTime for the start of the search
        after - -- the LocalDateTime for the end of the search
        Returns:
        the events found in that range
        Throws:
